skill.name: linear-milestones-write
skill.description: Create and update Linear project milestones via CLI (write operations)
skill.summary: Create and update Linear project milestones via CLI (write operations)
skill.author: Bind

security_audit.summary: Straightforward CLI tool for Linear milestone management. Capabilities are consistent with stated purpose. Requires LINEAR_API_KEY for authenticated API access to Linear's service.

content.value_statement: Managing project milestones manually in Linear takes time and context switching. This skill lets you create and update milestones directly from the command line using simple flags and arguments.
actual_capabilities: Create new milestones with name, description, and target date
Update existing milestone name, description, or target date
Resolve projects by name using partial case-insensitive matching
Output results in JSON or human-readable format
Get help information for all command options
limitations: Only supports write operations (create and update)
Milestone IDs must be UUIDs (use list-milestones to find them)
Bun runtime must be installed on the system

use_cases.title: Plan release cycles
use_cases.description: Create milestones with target dates for release planning and tracking

use_cases.title: Track sprint goals
use_cases.description: Define milestones for sprint endings and update progress as work completes

use_cases.title: Automate milestone workflows
use_cases.description: Script milestone creation and updates as part of deployment pipelines

prompt_templates.title: Create milestone
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a milestone called "v2.0 Release" in the "MyProject" project with target date 2025-06-01

prompt_templates.title: Update milestone
prompt_templates.prompt: Update milestone abc123 to have name "v2.1 Release" and new target date 2025-07-15

prompt_templates.title: Milestone with description
prompt_templates.prompt: Create milestone "Q2 Launch" in "MobileApp" project with description "Major feature release with new onboarding flow"

prompt_templates.title: Batch updates
prompt_templates.prompt: Update milestone def456 with new target date and set description to "Revised deadline based on dependency updates"

output_examples.input: Create milestone "Alpha Release" in project "Mount Vernon"

best_practices: Store LINEAR_API_KEY securely in environment variables or .env files
Use JSON output when integrating with scripts or CI/CD pipelines
Verify milestone IDs using list commands before performing updates
anti_patterns: Hardcoding API keys in scripts or version control
Using milestone IDs from memory without verification
Skipping the --json flag when parsing output programmatically

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for milestone management tasks.

faq.question: What are the rate limits?
faq.answer: Rate limits follow Linear API limits. Check your Linear plan for specific quotas.

faq.question: How do I integrate with other tools?
faq.answer: Use JSON output with --json flag and pipe to other CLI tools or scripts.

faq.question: Is my API key secure?
faq.answer: Keys are passed to Linear API only. Never commit keys to version control.

faq.question: Why is my command failing?
faq.answer: Verify LINEAR_API_KEY is set, project name exists, and milestone IDs are valid UUIDs.

faq.question: How does this compare to the web UI?
faq.answer: CLI enables faster operations and scripting compared to manual web interface work.
